alert.note: Alert for Juneau; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Wisconsin including the following counties, Juneau, eastern Vernon, and west central Monroe. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 140 PM CDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tomah, Mauston, New Lisbon, Elroy, Hillsboro, Wonewoc, Glendale, Lemonweir, Lindina, Norwalk, Camp Douglas, Ontario, Wilton, Ridgeville, Kendall, Clifton, Oakdale, Union Center, Hustler and Hoffman Corners. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
